entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
